page.title: 09A LEVEL CHOICES AT 16 PLUS.
page.content: During the last two years of my life I found the Geography O level one of the most interesting subjects I took and on asking others who took the A level and found it carried on in this way , I decided to continue with it as an A level choice .Maths is also a subject I find interesting but I also have a mathematically inclined brain as opposed to an art-type brain and find processes involving numbers interesting .Economics was suggested to me as a good choice of subject to go with Maths and Geography and involves some Maths and keeps up to date with present society.I chose these subjects with no career in mind but because I enjoyed them and was able to do them.
